message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. Given its potential, I'm initially offering it at $1,600,000. This price reflects the true value and benefits it brings.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. This is the highest I'm willing to go.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However,  $1,200,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider coming down to $1,450,000.  I believe this price is a fair reflection of its potential.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still at $1,200,000. I'm not willing to go any higher.

Bob, I respect your position, but I'm still confident that this product offers you significant value beyond $1,200,000. How about we meet in the middle at $1,325,000? This would allow you to reap substantial benefits while acknowledging the product's inherent worth.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still at $1,200,000. I'm not willing to go any higher.
